originalText.text:
WORST CUSOTMER SERVICE ON EARTH!! If you get a damaged item. Good luck. You have to try and dispute it on your credit card. There is no help or support.

I am out $750 for a broken vase.

It is hard to truly express how bad their support is.

originalText.text: 1stdibs has all kinds of stealth charges in  place for artist sellers. beware. they say it's free, and it appears they are making their money based on the steep  commission they take when a sale is made, but actually they create a system  to have "featured" works and do not properly credit the seller as it is not a simple direct transaction ON THEIR PART. terrible business taking advantage of artists. and I do not appreciate it if stealth charges are also being charged to my clients. Isn't it wonderful to to wake up and see yet again stealth charges in my credit card statement. Make a system that isn't DESIGNED to trip up your artist /sellers. terrible policy. terrible business. terrible design.

originalText.text: I purchased an extremely expensive and what was advertised as a polished and lawyered burned oak and brushed.metal coffee table. When it arrived, it had unsightly black streaks all over the top of the table. I wrote to them with pictures and asked if that was natural. They told me no. Then the seller said it was natural and demanded a 2000 shipping fee and a 25  percent restocking fee. I then contacted my local woodworking shop who got rid of all the black streaks and  properly polished and lacquered the table top. Nevertheless even after showing 1st dibs the before and after pictures they refused to to reimburse me for the repair or the cost for the mover to take it out and bring it back. Go elsewhere. They are snooty. condescending and are only after your mo ey I won’t e  er do business with them again. Good luck!

originalText.text: I waited and saved 5 years to purchase a piece of jewelry.  As requested payment was made by wire same day as the offer accepted. I was truly disappointed when bracelet was to small. Getting a refund was not easy. I returned the bracelet within 24 hours, paying extra for shipping and insurance. The antique store was great in okaying my refund. The product was returned 2/6/2021 and I am still waiting for a wire refund.  I talked, texted, requested my money. Same on you1st Dibs!

originalText.text: Don't buy anything from 1stDibs. I have been trying to get shipping details for an order placed on December 10th with no response. I have contacted 1stDibs Customer Service to assist multiple times and have received the run around for over a week. I have requested to cancel this order and issue a refund multiple times to no avail. What they are doing is tantamount to theft. Do not purchase from 1stDibs because you will have absolutely no buyer protection or recourse despite their advertisements to the contrary.
